text:
Hi all, we recently launched AI Ticket Agent app on HubSpot Marketplace. It aims to boost productivity and speed up response times for Tickets, with auto ticket insights from Knowledge Graphs and Copilot assistance throughout the ticket lifecycle. Knowledge Graphs is built from historical tickets and your knowledge base such as Web Help Center and Confluence.
We would love to hear your feedback and suggestions! and work with you to prioritize the features :slightly_smiling_face:
<https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/46929604/marketplace/apps/ai-ticket-agent>
